title: Smart Buffalo Farm Management System Design and Application

context.prior_knowledge: Basic agricultural management knowledge and proficiency in basic smartphone app usage
context.additional_context: Learners aim for advanced expertise in small-scale buffalo farm management, focusing on developing on-site problem-solving skills with smart technologies. Conduct practice-centered projects in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Apply the ADDIE model to execute agricultural management app design processes step-by-step
Design digital system functionalities for record management, health monitoring, and breeding management in buffalo farms
Prototype app interfaces tailored to farmers' requirements reflecting user-centered design principles
Develop app solutions applicable to real farm management scenarios through project-based assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
